p:
In correlation with the previous knowledge of CoVs genome composition, AT% was higher than GC% in SARS‐CoV‐2.
28 ,
30 In all of the structural genes of SARS‐CoV‐2, either A or T nucleotides were the most predominant nucleotides. In addition, A or T nucleotides were the most predominant nucleotides at the 3rd position of codons. This is in agreement with the previous studies of CoVs.
25 ,
31
